Sickness_NN in_IN the_DT Hospitals_NNS of_IN the_DT Asylums.10_NNP ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.
unnecessarily_RB to_TO the_DT outlay_NN of_IN an_DT expensive_JJ institution_NN without_IN corresponding_VBG advantage_NN ;_: for_IN it_PRP is_VBZ evident_JJ that_IN the_DT care_NN of_IN these_DT harmless_JJ insanes_NNS could_MD be_VB efficiently_RB secured_VBN at_IN much_RB less_JJR expense_NN to_TO the_DT State_NNP ,_, either_RB by_IN erecting_VBG suitable_JJ wards_NNS ,_, huts_NNS ,_, or_CC sheds_NNS in_IN connection_NN with_IN mofussil_JJ dispensaries_NNS or_CC by_IN adopting_VBG a_DT system_NN of_IN boarding_VBG out_RP under_IN efficient_JJ general_JJ and_CC medical_JJ inspection_NN ._.
The_DT Superintendent_NNP has_VBZ been_VBN successful_JJ in_IN introducing_VBG useful_JJ and_CC remunerative_JJ occupations_NNS among_IN the_DT inmates_NNS of_IN the_DT asylum_NN ;_: such_JJ occupations_NNS are_VBP remedial_JJ agents_NNS of_IN great_JJ value_NN and_CC ,_, from_IN an_DT economical_JJ point_NN of_IN view_NN ,_, are_VBP of_IN considerable_JJ pecuniary_JJ importance_NN to_TO Government_NNP ._.

The_DT system_NN followed_VBD of_IN opening_VBG the_DT asylum_NN at_IN proper_JJ times_NNS to_TO the_DT inspection_NN of_IN the_DT public_NN is_VBZ one_CD calculated_VBN to_TO secure_VB public_JJ confidence_NN in_IN the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT institution_NN and_CC to_TO dispel_VB erroneous_JJ ideas_NNS touching_VBG the_DT treatment_NN to_TO which_WDT the_DT afflicted_VBN inmates_NNS are_VBP subjected_VBN ._.

Calicut_NNP Lunatic_NNP Asylum.12_NNP ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.

The_DT increase_NN took_VBD place_NN chiefly_NN in_IN the_DT items_NNS of_IN pay_NN of_IN establish-_JJ ment_NN ,_, diets_NNS including_VBG wines_NNS ,_, perishable_JJ articles_NNS ,_, contingencies_NNS and_CC European_JJ medicines_NNS ._.

I_PRP HAVE_VBP the_DT honor_NN to_TO submit_VB the_DT report_NN on_IN the_DT Madras_NNP Lunatic_NNP Asylum_NNP for_IN the_DT official_JJ year_NN 1877-78_CD ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT two_CD cottages_NNS for_IN superior_JJ patients_NNS have_VBP been_VBN handed_VBN over_IN to_TO me_PRP and_CC suitably_RB furnished_VBN and_CC are_VBP now_RB occupied_VBN ,_, proving_VBG most_JJS useful_JJ for_IN the_DT accommo-_JJ dation_NN of_IN patients_NNS of_IN a_DT better_JJR class_NN ._.
No_DT new_JJ buildings_NNS have_VBP been_VBN erected_VBN owing_VBG to_TO want_VB of_IN funds_NNS caused_VBN by_IN the_DT heavy_JJ expenditure_NN connected_VBN with_IN the_DT famine_NN ._.
Government_NN have_VBP been_VBN pleased_VBN to_TO sanction_VB an_DT upper_JJ story_NN to_TO the_DT Superintendent_NNP 's_POS quarters_NNS ,_, which_WDT ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ hoped_VBN ,_, will_MD be_VB erected_VBN as_RB early_RB as_IN possible_JJ after_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT official_JJ year_NN ._.
This_DT is_VBZ much_RB needed_VBN for_IN the_DT protection_NN of_IN the_DT family_NN of_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP ,_, who_WP have_VBP at_IN present_JJ no_DT place_NN of_IN security_NN in_IN the_DT event_NN of_IN dangerous_JJ patients_NNS escaping_VBG from_IN their_PRP$ wards_NNS ._.
The_DT hot_JJ season_NN is_VBZ the_DT time_NN when_WRB this_DT class_NN of_IN patients_NNS are_VBP usually_RB admitted_VBN ._.
The_DT want_NN of_IN a_DT latrine_NN for_IN the_DT servants_NNS of_IN the_DT medical_JJ and_CC other_JJ subordinates_NNS is_VBZ much_JJ felt_NN ,_, and_CC one_CD could_MD be_VB erected_VBN on_IN open_JJ ground_NN beyond_IN the_DT dead-house_NN ,_, where_WRB it_PRP could_MD be_VB daily_RB inspected_VBN ,_, and_CC in_IN that_DT position_NN would_MD not_RB prove_VB a_DT nuisance_NN to_TO any_DT one_CD and_CC could_MD be_VB used_VBN by_IN the_DT asylum_NN servants_NNS generally_RB ._.
This_DT is_VBZ a_DT measure_NN that_WDT should_MD be_VB adopted_VBN for_IN the_DT better_JJR sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN that_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT grounds_NNS which_WDT at_IN present_NN are_VBP only_RB kept_VBN in_IN order_NN by_IN constant_JJ vigilance_NN ._.
Some_DT extra_JJ godowns_NNS and_CC a_DT cook-room_NN are_VBP also_RB needed_VBN by_IN the_DT subordinates_NNS and_CC head_JJ European_JJ attendants_NNS ._.
The_DT subject_NN of_IN the_DT drain_NN ,_, gates_NNS in_IN the_DT cook-room_NN ,_, and_CC female_JJ enclosure_NN have_VBP been_VBN specially_RB brought_VBN to_TO notice_NN and_CC will_MD shortly_RB be_VB attended_VBN to_TO ._.
The_DT gloomy_JJ appearance_NN of_IN the_DT block_NN of_IN 9_CD and_CC 12_CD rooms_NNS to_TO which_WDT I_PRP alluded_VBD in_IN my_PRP$ last_JJ annual_JJ report_NN ,_, caused_VBN by_IN the_DT walls_NNS being_VBG tarred_VBN to_TO a_DT considerable_JJ height_NN ,_, might_MD be_VB obviated_VBN by_IN removing_VBG the_DT tar_NN and_CC substituting_VBG a_DT coat_NN of_IN paint_NN ,_, which_WDT has_VBZ proved_VBN successful_JJ in_IN the_DT criminal_JJ enclosure_NN ._.
I_PRP am_VBP still_RB of_IN opinion_NN ,_, however_RB ,_, that_IN glazed_JJ tiles_NNS ,_, as_IN recommended_VBN by_IN me_PRP last_JJ year_NN ,_, would_MD prove_VB more_RBR lasting_JJ ,_, cheerful_JJ ,_, and_CC cleanly_RB ._.
Two_CD permanent_JJ wells_NNS have_VBP been_VBN constructed_VBN ,_, one_CD in_IN the_DT criminal_JJ enclosure_NN and_CC the_DT other_JJ near_IN the_DT Superintendent_NNP 's_POS quarters_NNS ;_: both_DT yield_VBP a_DT liberal_JJ supply_NN of_IN good_JJ water_NN ,_, there_EX being_VBG a_DT stratum_NN of_IN potable_JJ water_NN along_IN that_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT grounds_NNS ._.
The_DT two_CD other_JJ wells_NNS sanctioned_VBN during_IN the_DT water-famine_JJ were_VBD abandoned_VBN on_IN the_DT setting_NN in_IN of_IN the_DT monsoon_NN and_CC the_DT temporary_JJ pot-wells_NNS filled_VBN in_IN ._.
4_CD 14_CD ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT general_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN and_CC its_PRP$ inmates_NNS is_VBZ satisfactory_JJ ,_, although_IN from_IN the_DT high_JJ death-rate_NN it_PRP might_MD not_RB appear_VB so_RB ._.

Comparing_VBG the_DT expenditure_NN under_IN this_DT heading_NN with_IN the_DT year_NN 1873-74_JJ ,_, at_IN the_DT lose_NN of_IN which_WDT I_PRP took_VBD charge_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN ,_, I_PRP am_VBP able_JJ to_TO show_VB the_DT following_JJ mazing_NN difference:22_JJ ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.
Messrs._NNS Morris_NNP and_CC Bruce_NNP ,_, conduct_VBP the_DT duties_NNS of_IN their_PRP$ trying_VBG post_NN in_IN a_DT creditable_JJ manner_NN ._.
Mr._NNP Bruce_NNP was_VBD appointed_VBN in_IN November_NNP last_JJ in_IN lieu_NN of_IN Mr._NNP Coyne_NNP ,_, who_WP resigned_VBD in_IN order_NN to_TO take_VB up_RP the_DT more_RBR lucrative_JJ post_NN of_IN Jailor_NNP at_IN Cuddapah_NNP ._.
He_PRP is_VBZ a_DT steady_JJ ,_, well-behaved_JJ man_NN ,_, and_CC will_MD ,_, I_PRP trust_VBP ,_, as_IN he_PRP gains_NNS more_RBR experience_NN ,_, prove_VB a_DT good_JJ and_CC trustworthy_JJ attendant_NN ._.
The_DT two_CD 1st-Class_JJ East_NNP Indian_JJ Keepers_NNP ,_, Berryman_NNP and_CC Muriel_NNP ,_, work_NN exceedingly_RB well_RB ._.
To_TO Mr._NNP Berryman_NNP is_VBZ entrusted_VBN the_DT care_NN of_IN the_DT criminal_JJ enclosure_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD appointed_VBN in_IN February_NNP last_JJ vice_NN Bruce_NNP promoted_VBD to_TO Head_NNP European_NNP Attendant_NNP ._.
So_RB far_RB he_PRP has_VBZ done_VBN well_RB and_CC is_VBZ kind_NN and_CC attentive_NN to_TO the_DT patients_NNS and_CC takes_VBZ great_JJ interest_NN in_IN the_DT weaving_NN ._.
His_PRP$ pay_NN of_IN Rupees_NNP 15_CD per_IN mensem_NN is_VBZ a_DT sum_JJ wholly_RB inade-_JJ quate_NN to_TO induce_VB any_DT good_JJ man_NN to_TO come_VB forward_RB ;_: and_CC Berryman_NNP ,_, like_IN Bruce_NNP ,_, is_VBZ only_RB holding_VBG it_PRP until_IN something_NN better_RB turns_VBZ up_RP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ to_TO be_VB regretted_VBN that_IN so_RB important_JJ a_DT post_NN is_VBZ only_RB made_VBD a_DT stepping-stone_NN of_IN and_CC taken_VBN as_IN a_DT temporary_JJ measure_NN ;_: and_CC no_DT fewer_JJR than_IN three_CD men_NNS accepted_VBD the_DT berth_NN for_IN a_DT time_NN and_CC resigned_VBD owing_VBG to_TO the_DT nature_NN of_IN the_DT work_NN and_CC the_DT small_JJ salary_NN ._.
I_PRP trust_VBP that_DT Government_NNP may_MD take_VB the_DT circumstances_NNS of_IN the_DT case_NN into_IN their_PRP$ very_RB favorable_JJ consideration_NN and_CC increase_VB the_DT pay_NN of_IN the_DT Sergeant_NNP in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT Criminal_NNP Jail_NNP from_IN Rupees_NNP 15_CD to_TO Rupees_NNP 30_CD ,_, considering_VBG the_DT satisfactory_JJ manner_NN in_IN which_WDT the_DT weaving_NN is_VBZ progressing_VBG and_CC the_DT large_JJ saving_NN that_WDT is_VBZ now_RB being_VBG effected_VBN by_IN the_DT manufacture_NN of_IN excellent_JJ bedding_NN and_CC clothing_NN ._.
The_DT Steward_NNP 's_POS Department_NNP is_VBZ working_VBG satisfactorily_RB ,_, and_CC the_DT bedding_NN and_CC clothing_NN kept_NN in_IN a_DT much_RB better_JJR condition_NN than_IN hitherto_NN ._.
The_DT system_NN of_IN book-keeping_NN in_IN connection_NN with_IN this_DT department_NN ,_, introduced_VBN by_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_JJ ,_, answers_NNS admirably_RB ,_, and_CC no_DT difficulty_NN is_VBZ experienced_VBN in_IN working_VBG it_PRP ._.
The_DT night_NN watchmen_NNS work_VBP fairly_RB well_RB ._.
They_PRP require_VBP constant_JJ supervision_NN ._.
The_DT native_JJ warders_NNS are_VBP ,_, on_IN the_DT whole_NN ,_, a_DT very_RB indifferent_JJ set_NN of_IN men_NNS ._.
A_DT few_JJ work_NN well_RB ,_, but_CC I_PRP am_VBP sorry_JJ to_TO say_VB very_RB little_JJ reliance_NN can_MD be_VB placed_VBN in_IN them_PRP generally_RB ._.
They_PRP require_VBP constant_JJ looking_VBG after_IN ._.
Three_CD of_IN them_PRP are_VBP weavers_NNS by_IN trade_NN ._.
One_CD is_VBZ a_DT brick-layer_JJ and_CC several_JJ are_VBP experienced_JJ gardeners_NNS ._.
The_DT official_JJ visitors_NNS have_VBP regularly_RB inspected_VBN the_DT asylum_NN monthly_RB ._.
Vaccination_NN has_VBZ been_VBN satisfactorily_RB carried_VBN on_IN ._.
I_PRP certify_VBP that_IN the_DT orders_NNS respecting_VBG the_DT custody_NN of_IN poisonous_JJ drugs_NNS issued_VBN by_IN the_DT Principal_NNP Inspector-General_NNP ,_, Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP ,_, dated_VBD 23rd_CD January_NNP 1863_CD ,_, are_VBP carefully_RB carried_VBN out_RP ._.
MADRAS_NNP ,_, (_( Signed_VBN )_) L._NNP C._NNP NANNEY_NNP ,_, Surgeon-Major_NNP ,_, 1st_CD April_NNP 1878_CD ._.

(_( Signed_VBN )_) W._NNP J._NNP VANSOMEREN_NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, MADRAS_NNP ,_, Deputy_NNP Surgeon-_NNP General_NNP ,_, I.M.S._NNP ,_, 24th_CD April_NNP 1878_CD ._.

23_CD ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP OF_IN THE_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUM_NNP ,_, WALTAIR_NNP ,_, FOR_IN THE_DT YEAR_NNP 1877-78_CD ._.

Of_IN these_DT 33_CD males_NNS and_CC 8_CD females_NNS remained_VBN from_IN the_DT previous_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC there_EX were_VBD 22_CD admissions_NNS ,_, viz._NN ,_, 19_CD males_NNS and_CC 3_CD females_NNS ._.
Of_IN the_DT 63_CD cases_NNS that_WDT were_VBD treated_VBN ,_, 7_CD were_VBD discharged_VBN ,_, viz._NN ,_, 5_CD males_NNS and_CC 2_CD females_NNS ;_: 1_CD male_JJ criminal_JJ lunatic_NN was_VBD transferred_VBN to_TO the_DT Madras_NNP Asylum_NNP ;_: 8_CD died_VBD ,_, viz._NN ,_, 7_CD males_NNS and_CC 1_CD female_NN ;_: and_CC there_EX are_VBP now_RB 47_CD cases_NNS under_IN treatment_NN ._.
Admissions.24_NNP ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.
One_CD birth_NN occurred_VBD during_IN the_DT year_NN ;_: the_DT mother_NN ,_, an_DT insane_NN named_VBN Nuki_NNP ,_, was_VBD admitted_VBN into_IN the_DT asylum_NN on_IN the_DT 20th_JJ November_NNP 1874_CD and_CC was_VBD found_VBN to_TO be_VB pregnant_JJ on_IN the_DT 17th_CD July_NNP 1877_CD ._.
Searching_VBG inquiry_NN was_VBD at_IN once_RB instituted_VBN regarding_VBG the_DT paternity_NN by_IN the_DT Assistant_NNP Magistrate_NNP and_CC subsequently_RB by_IN the_DT official_JJ visitors_NNS ,_, Deputy_NNP Surgeon-General_NNP ,_, District_NNP Judge_NNP ,_, and_CC District_NNP Magistrate_NNP ,_, but_CC nothing_NN was_VBD discovered_VBN regarding_VBG it_PRP ._.
After_IN the_DT woman_NN had_VBD become_VBN enceinte_JJ her_PRP$ mental_JJ condition_NN improved_VBD rapidly_RB ,_, and_CC she_PRP was_VBD discharged_VBN cured_VBN on_IN the_DT 19th_CD January_NNP 1878_CD ,_, two_CD months_NNS after_IN the_DT birth_NN of_IN her_PRP$ child_NN ._.
The_DT female_JJ cottage_NN is_VBZ enclosed_VBN by_IN a_DT henna_NN hedge_NN which_WDT practically_RB is_VBZ no_DT fence_NN at_IN all_DT as_IN it_PRP is_VBZ full_JJ of_IN gaps_NNS ._.
The_DT official_JJ visitors_NNS are_VBP of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT females_NNS should_MD be_VB removed_VBN into_IN the_DT criminal_JJ enclosure_NN ,_, the_DT male_NN criminals_NNS being_VBG transferred_VBN elsewhere_RB ._.
The_DT insanes_NNS are_VBP occupied_JJ morning_NN and_CC evening_NN in_IN watering_VBG the_DT young_JJ trees_NNS ,_, of_IN which_WDT there_EX are_VBP a_DT great_JJ number_NN ,_, clearing_VBG the_DT grounds_NNS of_IN weeds_NNS ,_, litter_NN and_CC decayed_JJ leaves_NNS ,_, and_CC drawing_VBG water_NN ;_: but_CC during_IN the_DT day_NN they_PRP amuse_VBP themselves_PRP with_IN musical_JJ instruments_NNS ,_, singing_NN ,_, &_CC c._NN Occupation_NN and_CC recreation_NN with_IN good_JJ diet_NN and_CC kind_NN treatment_NN are_VBP the_DT means_NNS used_VBN for_IN promoting_VBG recovery_NN ;_: I_PRP have_VBP noticed_VBN that_IN those_DT insanes_NNS who_WP work_VBP cheerfully_RB and_CC willingly_RB keep_VB the_DT best_JJS health_NN ._.
All_PDT the_DT deaths_NNS ,_, without_IN exception_NN ,_, occurred_VBD among_IN the_DT non-working_JJ insanes_NNS ._.
I_PRP am_VBP glad_JJ to_TO report_VB that_IN a_DT decided_JJ improvement_NN has_VBZ taken_VBN place_NN in_IN the_DT habits_NNS of_IN the_DT patients_NNS ._.
Those_DT of_IN really_RB filthy_JJ habits_NNS are_VBP now_RB very_RB few_JJ in_IN number_NN ._.
The_DT cottage_NN for_IN these_DT patients_NNS is_VBZ now_RB rarely_RB in_IN the_DT filthy_JJ state_NN it_PRP used_VBD to_TO be_VB ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT unusual_JJ lack_NN of_IN rain_NN farming_VBG operations_NNS were_VBD not_RB attempted_VBN ,_, but_CC sheep-farming_VBG on_IN a_DT small_JJ scale_NN was_VBD tried_VBN for_IN five_CD months_NNS when_WRB there_EX was_VBD sufficient_JJ pasture_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT amount_NN realised_VBN by_IN the_DT sale_NN of_IN stock_NN was_VBD very_RB encouraging_JJ ._.
An_DT attempt_NN is_VBZ being_VBG made_VBN to_TO lay_VB down_RP the_DT grounds_NNS in_IN ``_`` hurrialli_NN ''_'' grass_NN ,_, but_CC the_DT past_JJ year_NN has_VBZ been_VBN very_RB unfavorable_JJ for_IN such_JJ operations_NNS ._.
One_CD insane_NN effected_VBD his_PRP$ escape_NN and_CC was_VBD recaptured_VBN at_IN his_PRP$ village_NN ._.
This_DT man_NN had_VBD only_RB been_VBN admitted_VBN three_CD days_NNS previously_RB ;_: he_PRP removed_VBD the_DT temporary_JJ fastenings_NNS from_IN the_DT shattered_JJ door_NN of_IN his_PRP$ cottage_NN at_IN night_NN ,_, and_CC through_IN the_DT opening_NN thus_RB effected_VBD he_PRP made_VBD his_PRP$ exit_NN ._.
All_PDT the_DT doors_NNS and_CC windows_NNS which_WDT were_VBD damaged_VBN by_IN the_DT cyclone_NN of_IN October_NNP 1876_CD are_VBP now_RB in_IN process_NN of_IN repair_NN and_CC will_MD most_RBS probably_RB be_VB completed_VBN in_IN a_DT short_JJ time_NN ._.
No_DT epidemic_JJ prevailed_VBD ,_, though_IN two_CD villages_NNS (_( Chinna_NNP Waltair_NNP and_CC Pedda_NNP Waltair_NNP )_) ,_, distant_VBP a_DT few_JJ hundreds_NNS of_IN yards_NNS from_IN the_DT asylum_NN ,_, suffered_VBD severely_RB from_IN cholera_NN ._.
The_DT inmates_NNS of_IN the_DT asylum_NN enjoyed_VBD perfect_JJ immunity_NN from_IN the_DT disease_NN ;_: the_DT sanitation_NN of_IN the_DT premises_NNS is_VBZ strictly_RB attended_VBN to_TO always_RB ,_, but_CC during_IN the_DT prevalence_NN of_IN cholera_NN in_IN the_DT vicinity_NN sulphur_NN fumigation_NN is_VBZ carried_VBN out_IN daily_RB ._.
Last_JJ year_NN there_RB remained_VBD on_IN hand_NN the_DT sum_NN of_IN Rupees_NNP 40-8-4_CD from_IN the_DT Garden_NNP Fund_NNP ;_: 43_CD sheep_NN were_VBD purchased_VBN for_IN Rupees_NNP 36-10-6_CD ;_: 34_CD sheep_NN were_VBD sold_VBN for_IN Rupees_NNP 52-15-0_CD ._.
By_IN sale_NN of_IN garden_NN produce_VBP the_DT sum_NN of_IN Rupees_NNP 19-3-7_CD was_VBD realised_VBN ,_, and_CC there_RB now_RB remains_VBZ on_IN hand_NN the_DT sum_NN of_IN Rupees_NNP 72-12-3_NNP ._.
The_DT sum_NN of_IN Rupees_NNP 3-4-2_NNP was_VBD paid_VBN as_IN hire_NN for_IN cutting_VBG palmyra_NN leaves_NNS ._.
The_DT cost_NN of_IN maintaining_VBG an_DT insane_NN during_IN 1877-78_JJ in_IN this_DT asylum_NN has_VBZ been_VBN on_IN on_IN average_JJ Rupees_JJ 13-14-11_JJ per_IN mensem_NN ._.
The_DT supplier_NN had_VBD his_PRP$ diet_JJ rates_NNS raised_VBD ,_, owing_VBG to_TO scarcity_NN ,_, from_IN Annas_NNP 1-10_JJ per_IN full_JJ diet_NN to_TO Annas_VB 3_CD per_IN full_JJ diet_NN ,_, and_CC from_IN Annas_NNP 1-7_JJ per_IN reduced_VBN diet_NN to_TO Annas_NNP 2-3_JJ per_IN reduced_VBN diet_NN from_IN the_DT 1st_CD October_NNP 1877_CD under_IN Order_NN of_IN Government_NNP ,_, No_NNP ._.
2,232_CD ,_, of_IN 18th_CD September_NNP 1877_CD ._.
The_DT cost_NN of_IN diets_NNS is_VBZ recovered_VBN from_IN the_DT treasury_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT ``_`` other_JJ charges_NNS ``_`` credited_VBN to_TO Government_NNP agreeably_RB to_TO Government_NNP Order_NNP ,_, dated_VBD 15th_CD April_NNP 1875_CD ._.
Criminal_JJ insanes_NNS are_VBP wholly_RB supported_VBN at_IN the_DT cost_NN of_IN Government_NNP ,_, but_CC civil_JJ insanes_NNS by_IN the_DT various_JJ Local_NNP Fund_NNP Boards_NNP and_CC Municipalities_NNP ._.
A_DT meeting_NN of_IN the_DT official_JJ visitors_NNS takes_VBZ place_NN monthly_RB ._.
Mr._NNP Morris_NNP ,_, the_DT Apothecary_NNP in_IN charge_NN ,_, has_VBZ given_VBN me_PRP great_JJ satisfaction_NN in_IN the_DT discharge_NN of_IN his_PRP$ duties_NNS ._.
The_DT Head_NNP Warder_NNP is_VBZ a_DT decent_JJ enough_JJ man_NN ,_, but_CC he_PRP wants_VBZ firmness_NN of_IN character_NN ;_: is_VBZ too_RB mild_JJ and_CC lacks_VBZ authority_NN over_IN those_DT under_IN him_PRP ._.

2_CD ._.

4_CD ._.

1,523_CD ._.
Madras_NNP .._NNP .._NNP .._NNP .._NNP .._NNP .._VBD 386_CD Waltair_NNP .._NNP .._NNP .._NNP .._NNP .._NNP .._VBD 63_CD Calicut_NNP .._NNP .._NNP .._NNP .._NNP .._NNP .._VBD 64_CD Total_NNP .._VBD 513_CD The_DT Annual_NNP Reports_NNP for_IN 1877-78_JJ on_IN the_DT three_CD Lunatic_NNP Asylums_NNP established_VBD at_IN Madras_NNP ,_, Waltair_NNP ,_, and_CC Calicut_NNP show_VBP that_IN the_DT number_NN of_IN inmates_NNS under_IN treatment_NN at_IN the_DT commencement_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN was_VBD 363_CD ;_: that_IN there_EX were_VBD 148_CD admissions_NNS and_CC two_CD re-admis-_JJ sions_NNS during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC that_IN the_DT aggregate_JJ number_NN treated_VBN was_VBD 513_CD ,_, *_NN of_IN which_WDT 389_CD were_VBD males_NNS and_CC 124_CD females_NNS ._.
The_DT number_NN cured_VBN and_CC discharged_VBN was_VBD 97_CD ,_, transferred_VBN to_TO friends_NNS 16_CD ,_, and_CC otherwise_RB disposed_VBN of_IN 5_CD ,_, making_VBG in_IN all_DT 118_CD discharged_VBN from_IN the_DT Asylums_NNP ,_, besides_IN 80_CD deaths_NNS ._.
The_DT number_NN that_WDT remained_VBD in_IN the_DT Asylums_NNP on_IN the_DT 1st_CD April_NNP 1878_CD was_VBD 315_CD ;_: 241_CD men_NNS and_CC 74_CD females_NNS ._.
Compared_VBN with_IN the_DT preceding_VBG year_NN 1876-77_CD ,_, the_DT admissions_NNS were_VBD less_JJR by_IN 18_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT re-admissions_NNS by_IN 4_CD ;_: while_IN the_DT cures_NNS were_VBD greater_JJR by_IN 41_CD ,_, and_CC the_DT deaths_NNS by_IN 8_CD ;_: the_DT latter_JJ being_VBG due_JJ to_TO the_DT general_JJ unsatisfactory_JJ state_NN of_IN health_NN of_IN the_DT Presidency_NNP ._.
2_CD ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN criminal_JJ lunatics_NNS in_IN the_DT three_CD Asylums_NNP was_VBD 92_CD at_IN the_DT commence-_JJ ment_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, there_EX were_VBD 23_CD admissions_NNS during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT total_JJ number_NN under_IN treatment_NN was_VBD 115_CD ;_: of_IN this_DT number_NN 25_CD were_VBD discharged_VBN and_CC 26_CD died_VBD ,_, and_CC there_RB remained_VBN at_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN 64_CD ,_, or_CC 28_CD less_JJR than_IN the_DT number_NN (_( 92_CD )_) at_IN the_DT end_NN of_IN 1876-77_JJ ._.
The_DT daily_JJ average_JJ number_NN for_IN the_DT last_JJ three_CD years_NNS strengthens_VBZ the_DT opinion_NN expressed_VBN by_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_NNP last_JJ year_NN ,_, that_IN special_JJ arrangement_NN for_IN the_DT accom-_JJ modation_NN of_IN criminal_JJ lunatics_NNS will_MD soon_RB become_VB necessary_JJ ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT classes_NNS to_TO which_WDT the_DT persons_NNS admitted_VBD during_IN the_DT year_NN belonged_VBD ,_, were44_VBD 4_CD ._.
The_DT ages_NNS on_IN admission_NN show_NN that_IN the_DT largest_JJS number_NN of_IN persons_NNS were_VBD between_IN 20_CD to_TO 40_CD ,_, and_CC between_IN 40_CD and_CC 60_CD ._.
The_DT Surgeon-General_NNP is_VBZ of_IN opinion_NN that_IN the_DT tendency_NN to_TO insanity_NN is_VBZ most_RBS distinctly_RB marked_VBN in_IN the_DT third_JJ and_CC fourth_JJ decennia_NN of_IN life_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ less_RBR between_IN the_DT 40th_CD and_CC 60th_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN ._.
5_CD ._.
The_DT 150_CD admissions_NNS are_VBP classed_VBN as_IN under:45_JJ 1876-77_CD ._.
1877-78_JJ ._.

2_CD ._.
No_DT new_JJ buildings_NNS have_VBP been_VBN erected_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
A_DT door_NN has_VBZ been_VBN placed_VBN in_IN the_DT female_JJ enclosure_NN in_IN lieu_NN of_IN the_DT open_JJ gateway_NN ;_: this_DT was_VBD much_RB needed_VBN ,_, and_CC has_VBZ proved_VBN a_DT source_NN of_IN comfort_NN and_CC security_NN to_TO the_DT inmates_NNS ._.
A_DT similar_JJ improvement_NN has_VBZ been_VBN made_VBN at_IN the_DT cook-room_NN ,_, and_CC wire_NN gauze_NN nailed_VBD over_IN the_DT windows_NNS ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ of_IN great_JJ assistance_NN in_IN the_DT prevention_NN of_IN petty_JJ thefts_NNS ._.
The_DT water_NN used_VBN in_IN cooking_NN is_VBZ now_RB conveyed_VBN by_IN a_DT subterranean_JJ channel_NN from_IN the_DT nearest_JJS well_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ drawn_VBN by_IN a_DT tap_NN within_IN the_DT cook-room_NN ._.
This_DT was_VBD suggested_VBN by_IN me_PRP to_TO save_VB the_DT constant_JJ passing_NN in_IN and_CC out_IN of_IN patients_NNS and_CC warders_NNS carrying_VBG water_NN ._.
It_PRP was_VBD proposed_VBN to_TO carry_VB off_RP the_DT refuse_NN water_NN from_IN the_DT neighbourhood_NN of_IN the_DT two_CD wells_NNS near_IN the_DT kitchen_NN by_IN means_NNS of_IN a_DT drain_NN leading_VBG into_IN the_DT main_JJ channel_NN ._.
Only_RB a_DT portion_NN of_IN the_DT drain_NN was_VBD built_VBN ,_, when_WRB the_DT work_NN was_VBD stopped_VBN for_IN want_NN of_IN funds_NNS ;_: its_PRP$ completion_NN would_MD add_VB to_TO the_DT sanitary_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT place_NN ._.
Two_CD patients_NNS having_VBG effected_VBN their_PRP$ escape_NN by_IN climbing_VBG upon_IN the_DT top_NN of_IN the_DT latrine_NN in_IN the_DT criminal_JJ enclosure_NN ,_, this_DT latrine_NN and_CC the_DT corresponding_VBG one_CD in_IN the_DT noisy_JJ enclosure_NN have_VBP been_VBN removed_VBN as_IN they_PRP were_VBD too_RB near_IN the_DT outer_NN wall_NN ,_, and_CC have_VBP been_VBN rebuilt_VBN at_IN a_DT distance_NN of_IN 10_CD feet_NNS from_IN the_DT main_JJ wall_NN ._.
The_DT strong_JJ cottages_NNS for_IN the_DT use_NN of_IN dangerous_JJ European_JJ insanes_NNS ,_, which_WDT were_VBD sanctioned_VBN two_CD years_NNS ago_RB ,_, have_VBP not_RB yet_RB been_VBN commenced_VBN ;_: their_PRP$ want_NN is_VBZ much_RB felt_VBN ,_, and_CC during_IN the_DT hot_JJ weather_NN there_EX is_VBZ not_RB proper_JJ secure_NN accommodation_NN for_IN the_DT violent_JJ European_JJ soldiers_NNS who_WP are_VBP sent_VBN in_IN at_IN this_DT season_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT general_JJ condition_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN and_CC its_PRP$ inmates_NNS is_VBZ satisfactory_JJ ._.
The_DT number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS is_VBZ the_DT highest_JJS on_IN record_NN ,_, with_IN the_DT exception_NN of_IN 1871-72_JJ ,_, when_WRB the_DT transfer_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS from_IN Trichinopoly_NNP and_CC the_DT Monegar_NNP Choultry_NNP gave_VBD it_PRP a_DT fictitious_JJ value_NN ._.
The_DT death-rate_NN is_VBZ 19_CD less_JJR than_IN last_JJ year_NN ,_, and_CC the_DT percent-_JJ age_NN of_IN cures_NNS 24.26_CD on_IN average_JJ population_NN ._.
No_DT epidemic_NN has_VBZ visited_VBN the_DT asylum_NN ,_, although_IN the_DT season_NN has_VBZ been_VBN unhealthy_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT town_NN and_CC suburbs_NN of_IN Madras_NNP have_VBP suffered_VBN from_IN epidemics_NNS of_IN various_JJ kinds_NNS ._.
No_DT accidents_NNS of_IN a_DT serious_JJ nature_NN ,_, nor_CC suicides_NNS ,_, nor_CC homicides_NNS have_VBP occurred_VBN ._.
4_CD 14_CD ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.
There_EX have_VBP been_VBN five_CD escapes_NNS during_IN the_DT year_NN ,_, three_CD of_IN whom_WP were_VBD brought_VBN back_RB ,_, and_CC of_IN the_DT remaining_VBG two_CD ,_, who_WP were_VBD admitted_VBN as_IN criminals_NNS ,_, one_CD was_VBD trans-_NN ferred_VBN to_TO the_DT ordinary_JJ list_NN as_IN his_PRP$ time_NN of_IN imprisonment_NN had_VBD expired_VBN ._.

4_CD ._.

cure_NN ._.
Mild_NNP counter-irritation_NN is_VBZ frequently_RB of_IN marked_JJ benefit_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT blister_NN on_IN the_DT nape_NN of_IN the_DT neck_NN has_VBZ ,_, in_IN many_JJ cases_NNS ,_, transformed_VBD a_DT violent_NN and_CC maniacal_JJ patient_NN into_IN a_DT mild_JJ and_CC rational_JJ inmate_NN ;_: but_CC care_NN is_VBZ always_RB taken_VBN that_IN remedies_NNS of_IN this_DT class_NN should_MD not_RB assume_VB a_DT punitive_JJ character_NN ._.

The_DT non-restraint_JJ system_NN is_VBZ the_DT rule_NN of_IN the_DT institution_NN ,_, and_CC its_PRP$ salutary_JJ effects_NNS are_VBP often_RB markedly_RB observable_JJ in_IN new_JJ admissions_NNS brought_VBN in_IN under_IN the_DT custody_NN of_IN several_JJ men_NNS ,_, and_CC often_RB bound_VBD or_CC hand-cuffed_JJ with_IN a_DT character_NN for_IN much_JJ violence_NN ,_, who_WP on_IN being_VBG set_VBN at_IN liberty_NN and_CC treated_VBD according_VBG to_TO the_DT rules_NNS of_IN the_DT asylum_NN ,_, frequently_RB behave_VBP quietly_RB and_CC well_RB ._.

If_IN a_DT patient_NN becomes_VBZ dangerous_JJ or_CC annoying_VBG to_TO others_NNS ,_, he_PRP is_VBZ at_IN once_RB removed_VBN to_TO a_DT separate_JJ room_NN ,_, or_CC to_TO another_DT ward_NN ,_, and_CC sometimes_RB it_PRP is_VBZ found_VBN sufficient_JJ to_TO take_VB him_PRP for_IN a_DT brisk_JJ walk_NN ,_, after_IN which_WDT he_PRP quiets_VBZ down_RB ._.
This_DT is_VBZ usually_RB effectual_JJ with_IN noisy_JJ patients_NNS who_WP sing_VBP or_CC shout_NN and_CC disturb_VB the_DT others_NNS at_IN night_NN :_: the_DT warders_NNS are_VBP required_VBN to_TO walk_VB them_PRP up_RP and_CC down_RB till_NN they_PRP become_VBP composed_JJ ,_, after_IN which_WDT they_PRP usually_RB sleep_VBP ,_, and_CC this_DT often_RB proves_VBZ the_DT best_JJS hypnotic_NN ._.

I_PRP have_VBP established_VBN the_DT custom_NN ,_, which_WDT I_PRP find_VBP highly_RB profitable_JJ ,_, that_IN all_DT patients_NNS who_WP do_VBP not_RB join_VB in_IN some_DT active_JJ employment_NN through_IN the_DT day_NN should_MD walk_VB morning_NN and_CC evening_NN round_VBP the_DT grounds_NNS ,_, which_WDT are_VBP extensive_JJ and_CC well_RB planted_VBN with_IN avenues_NNS of_IN fine_JJ trees_NNS ._.
I_PRP find_VBP these_DT walks_NNS conducive_VBP of_IN quiet_JJ by_IN day_NN and_CC of_IN healthy_JJ natural_JJ sleep_NN by_IN night_NN ._.
The_DT women_NNS also_RB ,_, whose_WP$ chief_JJ occupation_NN ,_, sewing_NN ,_, is_VBZ of_IN a_DT sedentary_JJ nature_NN ,_, extend_VBP their_PRP$ walk_NN in_IN the_DT evenings_NNS beyond_IN the_DT limits_NNS of_IN the_DT enclosure_NN allotted_VBN to_TO them_PRP ,_, and_CC the_DT change_NN of_IN scene_NN is_VBZ cheerful_JJ and_CC refreshing_VBG to_TO them_PRP ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ much_JJ to_TO be_VB wished_VBN that_IN the_DT benefit_NN of_IN sea_NN air_NN could_MD be_VB added_VBN to_TO this_DT ,_, but_CC the_DT distance_NN from_IN the_DT shore_NN ,_, about_RB 4_CD miles_NNS ,_, and_CC want_VBP of_IN any_DT means_NNS of_IN conveying_VBG them_PRP thither_RB ,_, precludes_IN all_DT but_CC a_DT few_JJ of_IN the_DT richer_JJR patients_NNS from_IN enjoying_VBG this_DT advantage_NN ._.
With_IN those_DT whose_WP$ friends_NNS can_MD afford_VB a_DT conveyance_NN ,_, I_PRP make_VBP a_DT point_NN of_IN the_DT evening_VBG drive_NN to_TO the_DT beach_NN ,_, which_WDT I_PRP find_VBP very_RB beneficial_JJ ._.
Under_IN treatment_NN must_MD not_RB be_VB omitted_VBN work_NN and_CC recreation_NN ,_, both_DT most_RBS neces-_JJ sary_JJ to_TO divert_VB the_DT mind_NN from_IN painful_JJ introspection_NN and_CC imaginary_JJ troubles_NNS ._.

It_PRP is_VBZ pleasant_JJ to_TO see_VB one_CD native_JJ employed_VBN in_IN winding_VBG thread_NN :_: he_PRP runs_VBZ backwards_NNS and_CC forwards_NNS ,_, spindle_NN in_IN hand_NN ,_, cheerful_NN and_CC happy_JJ and_CC absorbed_VBN in_IN his_PRP$ work_NN ,_, walking_VBG miles_NNS in_IN the_DT course_NN of_IN the_DT day_NN ,_, and_CC is_VBZ a_DT notable_JJ instance_NN of_IN the_DT cheering_NN and_CC enlivening_VBG effects_NNS of_IN occupation_NN ._.
Out-door_JJ work_NN has_VBZ the_DT further_JJ advantage_NN of_IN being_VBG most_JJS healthful_JJ ._.

10_CD ._.
The_DT subject_NN of_IN occupation_NN is_VBZ one_CD of_IN great_JJ importance_NN in_IN the_DT treatment_NN of_IN the_DT insane_NN ;_: for_IN if_IN idleness_NN is_VBZ productive_JJ of_IN evil_JJ amongst_IN the_DT sane_NN ,_, much_RB more_RBR so_RB in_IN those_DT whose_WP$ minds_NNS have_VBP lost_VBN the_DT balance_NN ,_, which_WDT would_MD enable_VB them_PRP to_TO regulate_VB their_PRP$ actions_NNS and_CC thoughts_NNS aright_NN ,_, whose_WP$ idle_JJ broodings_NNS would_MD turn_VB on_IN delusions_NNS and_CC fancies_NNS dependent_VBP on_IN their_PRP$ malady_NN ._.

43_CD GOVERNMENT_NNP OF_NNP MADRAS_NNP ._.
JUDICIAL_NNP DEPARTMENT_NNP ._.
Read_JJ letter_NN from_IN Acting_VBG Surgeon-General_JJ H._NNP R._NNP OSWALD_NNP ,_, M.D._NNP ,_, Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP ,_, to_TO the_DT Acting_NNP Chief_NNP Secretary_NNP to_TO Government_NNP ,_, dated_VBD 30th_CD June_NNP 1879_CD ,_, No_DT ._.
325-A_JJ ,_, forwarding_JJ Annual_NNP Report_NNP on_IN Lunatic_NNP Asylums_NNP for_IN 1878-79_JJ ._.
ORDER_NNP THEREON_NNP ,_, 26th_CD November_NNP 1879_CD ,_, No_DT ._.
2982_CD ._.
*_NN Madras_NNP ,_, Vizagapatam_NNP ,_, and_CC Calicut_NNP ._.
The_DT Acting_NNP Surgeon-General_NNP ,_, Indian_NNP Medical_NNP Department_NNP ,_, submits_VBZ the_DT reports_NNS on_IN the_DT working_NN of_IN the_DT three*_NN Lunatic_NNP Asylums_NNP in_IN this_DT Presidency_NNP during_IN the_DT year_NN 1878-79_RB ._.
He_PRP compares_VBZ the_DT propor-_JJ tion_NN of_IN lunatics_NNS under_IN treatment_NN to_TO popu-_JJ lation_NN in_IN Madras_NNP ,_, Bengal_NNP Proper_NNP ,_, and_CC Scotland_NNP ,_, and_CC of_IN pauper_JJ lunatics_NNS in_IN England_NNP ,_, and_CC states_VBZ ``_`` nothing_NN certain_JJ is_VBZ known_VBN regarding_VBG the_DT comparative_JJ frequency_NN of_IN insanity_NN in_IN India_NNP and_CC Europe_NNP ,_, ''_'' and_CC that_IN the_DT great_JJ disparity_NN in_IN the_DT rates_NNS given_VBN ``_`` indicates_VBZ that_IN only_RB a_DT little_JJ of_IN the_DT subjects_NNS of_IN insanity_NN in_IN India_NNP come_VBP under_IN official_JJ cognizance_NN ._. ''_''
2.The_CD accommodation_NN in_IN the_DT three_CD asylums_NNS was_VBD sufficient_JJ for_IN 703_CD inmates_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT maximum_JJ number_NN confined_VBN during_IN any_DT one_CD night_NN in_IN the_DT year_NN did_VBD not_RB exceed_VB 342_CD ._.
There_EX were_VBD on_IN the_DT 1st_CD April_NNP 1878_CD 315_CD inmates_NNS in_IN the_DT asylum44_NN 5.The_CD largest_JJS number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS was_VBD of_IN persons_NNS between_IN the_DT ages_NNS of_IN 20_CD and_CC 40_CD ,_, and_CC 40_CD to_TO 60_CD ._.
This_DT ,_, it_PRP is_VBZ stated_VBN ,_, accords_NNS with_IN the_DT experience_NN of_IN former_JJ years_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ in_IN keeping_VBG with_IN the_DT average_JJ proportional_JJ age_NN on_IN admission_NN in_IN England_NNP during_IN 36_CD years_NNS ._.
The_DT admissions_NNS are_VBP classified_VBN thus45_IN 10.The_CD financial_JJ results_NNS are_VBP as_IN follow_JJ :_: ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP THE_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP IN_NNP THE_NNP MADRAS_NNP PRESIDENCY_NNP DURING_NNP THE_NNP YEAR_NNP 1879-80_CD ._.
MADRAS_NN :_: PRINTED_NN BY_NNP E._NNP KEYS_NNP ,_, AT_NNP THE_NNP GOVERNMENT_NNP PRESS_NNP ._.
1880_CD ._.

at_IN the_DT close_NN of_IN the_DT year_NN ._.
The_DT mortality_NN was_VBD certainly_RB high_JJ ._.

2_CD ._.

13_CD The_DT two_CD Head_NNP European_JJ Attendants_NNP ,_, Bruce_NNP and_CC Coleman_NNP ,_, have_VBP worked_VBN very_RB well_RB during_IN the_DT past_JJ seven_CD months_NNS and_CC gave_VBD me_PRP no_DT trouble_NN ._.

The_DT two_CD First-class_NNP East_NNP Indian_JJ Keepers_NNP ,_, Muriel_NNP and_CC Fowler_NNP ,_, did_VBD their_PRP$ best_JJS to_TO give_VB me_PRP satisfaction_NN ._.

The_DT Steward_NNP ,_, K._NNP Annu_NNP Chetty_NNP ,_, has_VBZ been_VBN under_IN me_PRP for_IN 5Â½_CD years_NNS ,_, first_RB as_IN Writer_NNP and_CC afterwards_NNS as_IN Steward_NNP ._.

2_CD ._.
The_DT more_RBR important_JJ general_JJ results_NNS for_IN the_DT year_NN 1878-79_JJ and_CC 1879-80_JJ are_VBP contrasted_VBN below:40_JJ series_NN of_IN years_NNS ._.
It_PRP was_VBD rendered_VBN possible_JJ by_IN the_DT carelessness_NN of_IN the_DT subordinate_NN native_JJ ayahs_NN who_WP neglected_VBD to_TO watch_VB the_DT well_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ usually_RB secured_VBN by_IN a_DT grating_NN while_IN it_PRP was_VBD open_JJ for_IN drawing_VBG water_NN ._.
The_DT Official_JJ Visitors_NNS propose_VBP that_IN pumps_NNS should_MD be_VB set_VBN up_RP to_TO prevent_VB the_DT possibility_NN of_IN similar_JJ occurrences_NNS in_IN future_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT question_NN will_MD be_VB referred_VBN to_TO the_DT Public_NNP Works_NNP Department_NNP for_IN consideration_NN ._.
3_CD ._.
The_DT year_NN was_VBD on_IN the_DT whole_NN more_RBR healthy_JJ than_IN its_PRP$ predecessor_NN as_IN the_DT dimi-_JJ nished_JJ percentage_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN daily_RB sick_JJ shows_NNS ._.
Fever_NNP was_VBD prevalent_JJ much_RB more_JJR than_IN in_IN 1878-79_JJ ,_, though_IN dysentery_NN was_VBD less_RBR active_JJ ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT percentage_NN of_IN cures_NNS to_TO admissions_NNS in_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN review_NN is_VBZ 41.86_CD ,_, and_CC is_VBZ lower_JJR than_IN in_IN any_DT year_NN since_IN 1873-74_JJ except_IN 1876-77_JJ (_( 32.55_CD )_) ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ noticeable_JJ that_IN in_IN 1877-78_CD the_DT percentage_NN was_VBD as_RB high_JJ as_IN 64.66_CD ._.
Famine_NNP brought_VBD out_RP or_CC devel-_JJ oped_JJ mental_NN disease_NN which_WDT yielded_VBD to_TO treatment_NN more_JJR easily_RB on_IN the_DT removal_NN of_IN the_DT predisposing_NN cause_NN ._.
The_DT low_JJ percentage_NN this_DT year_NN indicates_VBZ the_DT return_NN of_IN the_DT general_JJ population_NN to_TO its_PRP$ normal_JJ condition_NN and_CC can_MD not_RB be_VB ascribed_VBN to_TO treatment_NN ._.
The_DT per-_JJ centage_NN of_IN recoveries_NNS under_IN the_DT principal_JJ classes_NNS of_IN mental_JJ disease_NN to_TO total_JJ treated_VBN is_VBZ contrasted_VBN below_IN for_IN the_DT years_NNS 1878-79_JJ and_CC 1879-80_JJ :41_NN are_VBP said_VBD to_TO want_VB repair_NN and_CC separate_JJ accommodation_NN for_IN the_DT segregation_NN of_IN violent_NN or_CC noisy_JJ patients_NNS ._.

Dr._NNP Nanney_NNP ,_, on_IN leaving_VBG the_DT Madras_NNP Asylum_NNP after_IN 5Â½_CD years_NNS '_POS experience_NN ,_, alludes_NNS in_IN his_PRP$ report_NN to_TO the_DT great_JJ necessity_NN that_WDT exists_VBZ for_IN strong_JJ cottages_NNS for_IN violent_JJ patients_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT Public_NNP Works_NNP Department_NNP will_MD be_VB requested_VBN to_TO allot_VB the_DT necessary_JJ funds_NNS for_IN their_PRP$ erection_NN as_RB early_RB as_IN possible_JJ ._.
9_CD ._.

''_''

15_CD (_( d._NN )_) Financial_NNP Statement16_NNP ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.
ble_JJ clock_NN to_TO any_DT number_NN of_IN points_NNS ,_, is_VBZ better_RBR ,_, and_CC the_DT cost_NN is_VBZ much_RB less_RBR ._.
The_DT introduction_NN of_IN this_DT system_NN will_MD be_VB proposed_VBN ._.
The_DT Sweepers_NNP (_( especially_RB the_DT male_JJ ones_NNS )_) have_VBP been_VBN much_JJ given_VBN to_TO absence_VB without_IN leave_NN ._.
They_PRP are_VBP always_RB sure_JJ of_IN employment_NN and_CC can_MD combine_VB ,_, so_IN they_PRP are_VBP difficult_JJ to_TO deal_VB with_IN ._.
The_DT Dhoby_NNP is_VBZ underpaid_JJ ,_, receiving_VBG only_RB Rs_NNP ._.

IV.ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.
17_CD Of_IN the_DT 27_CD military_JJ patients_NNS 16_CD were_VBD Europeans_NNPS ._.
The_DT 11_CD Native_JJ military_JJ included_VBD 1_CD East_NNP Indian_JJ trumpeter_NN ._.
Of_IN the_DT 16_CD Europeans_NNPS 1_CD was_VBD an_DT officer_NN ,_, 8_CD were_VBD artillerymen_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT rest_NN were_VBD infantry_NN ._.
The_DT majority_NN of_IN the_DT infantry_NN came_VBD from_IN Burmah_NNP ._.
The_DT remarkable_JJ proportion_NN of_IN artillerymen_NNS ,_, considering_VBG the_DT small_JJ strength_NN of_IN artillery_NN compared_VBN with_IN that_DT of_IN the_DT infantry_NN in_IN this_DT Presidency_NNP ,_, may_MD be_VB accidental_JJ ._.
As_IN artillerymen_NNS are_VBP usually_RB more_RBR intelligent_JJ ,_, more_RBR occupied_JJ ,_, and_CC better_JJR paid_VBN than_IN the_DT infantry_NN ,_, one_CD would_MD expect_VB less_JJR insanity_NN among_IN them_PRP ._.
But_CC I_PRP understand_VBP that_IN there_EX is_VBZ a_DT larger_JJR proportion_NN of_IN courts-martial_JJ in_IN the_DT Royal_NNP Artillery_NNP ._.
If_IN this_DT be_VB due_JJ to_TO greater_JJR drunkenness_NN ,_, one_CD can_MD understand_VB the_DT greater_JJR insanity_NN ._.
Two_CD of_IN the_DT 16_CD soldiers_NNS were_VBD country-born_JJ ,_, and_CC so_RB was_VBD the_DT European_JJ military_JJ criminal_NN ._.

The_DT asylum_NN buildings_NNS have_VBP been_VBN repaired_VBN by_IN the_DT Public_NNP Works_NNP Department_NNP during_IN the_DT year_NN and_CC are_VBP in_IN want_NN of_IN white_JJ and_CC blue_JJ washing_NN ,_, and_CC after_IN much_JJ delay_NN and_CC correspondence_NN an_DT estimate_NN has_VBZ been_VBN prepared_VBN and_CC forwarded_VBN through_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_NNP for_IN the_DT sanction_NN of_IN Government_NNP ._.

2134_CD ,_, dated_VBD 15th_CD October_NNP 1881_CD ,_, sanctioned_VBD iron-barred_JJ doors_NNS to_TO the_DT ward_NN and_CC a_DT spiked_JJ railing_NN over_IN the_DT gate_NN of_IN the_DT criminal_JJ enclosure_NN ,_, and_CC these_DT altera-_JJ tions_NNS have_VBP been_VBN recently_RB executed_VBN by_IN the_DT Public_NNP Works_NNP Department_NNP ,_, but_CC are_VBP not_RB yet_RB quite_RB completed_VBN ._.
There_EX is_VBZ a_DT defect_NN which_WDT militates_VBZ greatly_RB against_IN the_DT successful_JJ working_NN of_IN this_DT asylum_NN ,_, and_CC that_DT is_VBZ the_DT want_NN of_IN separate_JJ detached_VBN buildings_NNS for_IN the_DT segregation_NN of_IN violent_NN and_CC noisy_JJ lunatics_NNS ._.
Both_DT sections_NNS of_IN the_DT asylum_NN ,_, male_NN and_CC female_NN ,_, are_VBP equally_RB in_IN need_NN of_IN these_DT buildings_NNS ._.

This_DT would_MD cause_VB no_DT increase_NN of_IN expenditure_NN beyond_IN the_DT first_JJ outlay_NN for_IN lamps_NNS ._.

ORDER_NNP (_( 46_CD )_) The_DT increases_NNS occur_VBP almost_RB entirely_RB under_IN Acute_NNP mania_NN and_CC Melancholia_NNP ,_, the_DT figures_NNS under_IN the_DT other_JJ heads_NNS showing_VBG little_JJ alteration_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ observed_VBN that_IN in_IN the_DT table_NN of_IN ``_`` Moral_JJ causes_NNS ,_, ''_'' next_JJ after_IN ``_`` Religion_NNP ,_, ''_'' appears_VBZ a_DT heading_VBG ``_`` Infidelity_NNP ,_, ''_'' to_TO which_WDT two_CD cases_NNS are_VBP ascribed_VBN ._.
The_DT heading_NN is_VBZ very_RB vague_JJ ,_, for_IN it_PRP appears_VBZ from_IN former_JJ reports_NNS that_IN the_DT supposed_VBN cause_NN of_IN insanity_NN thus_RB referred_VBN to_TO is_VBZ infidelity_NN of_IN a_DT wife_NN ._.
A_DT similarly_JJ incorrect_NN heading_NN is_VBZ noticed_VBN to_TO statement_NN IV_NNP in_IN the_DT appendix_NN ,_, which_WDT at_IN present_JJ runs_NNS :_: ``_`` Table_JJ showing_VBG the_DT occupation_NN of_IN several_JJ patients_NNS during_IN 1884-85_JJ ._. ''_''

The_DT percentage_NN of_IN recoveries_NNS to_TO admissions_NNS during_IN the_DT last_JJ three_CD years_NNS is_VBZ given_VBN in_IN the_DT margin_NN ._.
Although_IN lower_JJR than_IN in_IN 1883-84_JJ ,_, the_DT number_NN of_IN recoveries_NNS during_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN was_VBD still_RB satisfactory_JJ ._.
As_IN usual_JJ ,_, the_DT highest_JJS ratio_NN of_IN recoveries_NNS was_VBD to_TO be_VB found_VBN among_IN patients_NNS suffering_VBG from_IN acute_JJ mania_NN ,_, while_IN chronic_JJ dementia_NN appears_VBZ to_TO be_VB the_DT least_JJS hopeful_JJ form_NN of_IN disease_NN ._.

6_CD ._.
The_DT death_NN and_CC sick_JJ rates_NNS continued_VBD to_TO be_VB satisfactory_JJ ,_, though_IN the_DT former_JJ was_VBD a_DT little_JJ higher_JJR (_( 6.71_CD per_IN cent_NN ._. )_)

of_IN average_JJ daily_JJ strength_NN ._.

of_IN the_DT daily_JJ strength_NN ._.
The_DT heaviest_JJS death_NN rate_NN is_VBZ shown_VBN by_IN the_DT Waltair_NNP returns_NNS ,_, but_CC the_DT population_NN of_IN the_DT asylum_NN is_VBZ very_RB small_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT percentage_NN of_IN mortality_NN is_VBZ easily_RB raised_VBN by_IN the_DT reception_NN of_IN a_DT few_JJ patients_NNS in_IN bad_JJ health_NN ._.
In_IN the_DT Waltair_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, every_DT patient_NN who_WP was_VBD discharged_VBN as_IN cured_VBN during_IN the_DT year_NN had_VBD gained_VBN in_IN weight_NN since_IN entering_VBG the_DT asylum_NN ,_, while_IN at_IN Calicut_NNP of_IN the_DT total_JJ number_NN of_IN inmates_NNS ,_, 79_CD had_VBD gained_VBN in_IN weight_NN ,_, 7_CD remained_VBD in_IN statu_NN quo_NN ,_, and_CC 28_CD had_VBD lost_VBN weight_NN ._.

(_( d._NN )_) Causes.ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.
15_CD 16_CD ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.
Weaving_NNP is_VBZ carried_VBN on_IN in_IN the_DT criminal_JJ enclosure_NN ;_: four_CD English_NNP looms_NNS are_VBP at_IN work_NN ,_, an_DT average_NN of_IN 15_CD yards_NNS of_IN cloth_JJ daily_JJ being_VBG woven_VBN ._.
It_PRP furnishes_VBZ a_DT variety_NN of_IN occupations_NNS suited_VBN to_TO the_DT powers_NNS of_IN the_DT different_JJ patients_NNS ,_, such_JJ as_IN spinning_NN ,_, winding_VBG ,_, starching_VBG of_IN thread_NN ,_, filling_NN of_IN spindles_NNS ,_, &_CC c._NN Two_CD tailors_NNS cut_VBD out_RP the_DT cloth_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ made_VBN up_RP by_IN the_DT female_JJ patients_NNS ,_, assisted_VBN by_IN the_DT tailors_NNS and_CC a_DT sewing_JJ machine_NN ._.
The_DT washing_NN is_VBZ now_RB done_VBN entirely_RB in_IN machines_NNS purchased_VBN by_IN Dr._NNP Dobie_NNP from_IN Messrs._NNP Bradford_NNP and_CC Co._NNP ,_, London_NNP ,_, and_CC is_VBZ a_DT great_JJ improvement_NN on_IN the_DT old_JJ dhobie_NN system_NN ,_, the_DT wear_NN and_CC tear_NN of_IN the_DT clothes_NNS being_VBG reduced_VBN to_TO a_DT minimum_NN ._.
A_DT great_JJ saving_NN is_VBZ also_RB effected_VBN ._.
The_DT large_JJ machine_NN is_VBZ used_VBN for_IN all_PDT the_DT clothing_NN and_CC bedding_NN of_IN the_DT male_NN patients_NNS ,_, and_CC washes_VBZ 30_CD pieces_NNS in_IN a_DT quarter_NN of_IN an_DT hour_NN ._.
A_DT warder_NN and_CC six_CD patients_NNS are_VBP told_VBN off_RP for_IN the_DT work_NN ,_, which_WDT is_VBZ very_RB easily_RB learned_VBN by_IN any_DT one_CD ._.
The_DT small_JJ machine_NN is_VBZ worked_VBN by_IN the_DT female_JJ patients_NNS ,_, and_CC is_VBZ capable_JJ of_IN washing_VBG 10_CD or_CC 15_CD pieces_NNS in_IN a_DT quarter_NN of_IN an_DT hour_NN ._.
By_IN a_DT little_JJ care_NN and_CC attention_NN to_TO the_DT instructions_NNS given_VBN ,_, the_DT clothes_NNS are_VBP washed_VBN very_RB clean_JJ ,_, and_CC it_PRP is_VBZ astonishing_VBG the_DT amount_NN of_IN pleasure_NN and_CC appreciation_NN shown_VBN by_IN the_DT inmates_NNS at_IN the_DT result_NN ._.
Gardening_NN is_VBZ productive_JJ of_IN much_JJ good_JJ amongst_IN the_DT inmates_NNS ._.
Vegetables_NNS required_VBN for_IN the_DT diets_NNS are_VBP supplied_VBN to_TO the_DT contractor_NN ;_: cocoanuts_NNS ,_, tamarind_NN ,_, lucerne_JJ and_CC grass_NN sold_VBN ,_, and_CC the_DT proceeds_NNS used_VBN to_TO decorate_VB the_DT grounds_NNS with_IN shrubs_NNS ,_, evergreens_NNS ,_, and_CC crotons_NNS ,_, the_DT planting_NN and_CC care_NN of_IN which_WDT are_VBP entrusted_VBN to_TO patients_NNS who_WP interest_NN themselves_PRP in_IN the_DT work_NN ._.
A_DT few_JJ patients_NNS assist_VBP at_IN the_DT cook-room_NN and_CC in_IN carrying_VBG round_NN food_NN ,_, others_NNS sweeping_VBG and_CC cleaning_VBG the_DT grounds_NNS ._.
A_DT carpenter_NN 's_POS and_CC blacksmith_NN 's_POS shed_VBN have_VBP been_VBN erected_VBN near_IN the_DT office_NN and_CC one_CD or_CC two_CD inmates_NNS found_VBD to_TO be_VB excellent_JJ workmen_NNS ._.

27_CD The_DT following_VBG table_JJ showing_VBG the_DT number_NN remained_VBD ,_, discharged_VBD ,_, died_VBD ,_, &_CC c._NN ,_, (_( civil_JJ and_CC criminal_JJ lunatics_NNS )_) during_IN nine_CD months_NNS is_VBZ hereto_JJ annexed:28_JJ ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.
(_( f._NN )_) Amongst_$ 18_CD recoveries_NNS ,_, 11_CD were_VBD from_IN mania_NN (_( being_VBG the_DT more_RBR prevalent_JJ type_NN of_IN insanity_NN )_) ,_, 6_CD from_IN dementia_NN and_CC 1_CD from_IN paralysis_NN insanorum_NN ._.
All_DT cases_NNS of_IN discharged_VBN ``_`` cured_VBN ''_'' have_VBP gained_VBN in_IN weight_NN ._.
One_CD amongst_VBZ them_PRP was_VBD peculiarly_RB noteworthy_JJ ._.
He_PRP was_VBD admitted_VBN in_IN a_DT ``_`` very_RB bad_JJ ''_'' state_NN of_IN health_NN and_CC I_PRP never_RB thought_VBD that_IN he_PRP would_MD rally_RB ._.
He_PRP used_VBD to_TO bleat_VB like_IN a_DT goat_NN and_CC move_NN like_IN a_DT quadruped_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD very_RB much_JJ afraid_NN of_IN people_NNS approaching_VBG him_PRP and_CC would_MD cry_VB in_IN a_DT very_RB pitiable_JJ manner_NN ._.
He_PRP was_VBD a_DT lad_NN of_IN 18_CD years_NNS old_JJ ,_, named_VBN Koru_NNP ,_, about_RB 4_CD feet_NNS 7_CD inches_NNS high_JJ ,_, small_JJ head_NN ,_, and_CC a_DT projecting_NN chin_NN ._.
The_DT alleged_VBN cause_NN was_VBD said_VBD to_TO be_VB starvation_NN ._.
There_EX was_VBD no_DT apparent_JJ improvement_NN for_IN a_DT year_NN or_CC until_IN he_PRP gained_VBD 30_CD lb_NN ._.
in_IN weight_NN ,_, then_RB he_PRP showed_VBD symptoms_NNS of_IN mental_JJ improvement_NN in_IN proportion_NN to_TO the_DT bodily_JJ improvement_NN ._.
After_IN an_DT increase_NN of_IN 40_CD lb_NN ._.
some_DT mental_JJ improvement_NN was_VBD observable_JJ ,_, 50_CD lb_NN ._.
a_DT decided_JJ improvement_NN ,_, and_CC 55Â¼_CD lb_NN ._.
or_CC when_WRB he_PRP weighed_VBD 124Â½_CD lb._NN ,_, he_PRP became_VBD perfectly_RB sane_VBN ,_, and_CC was_VBD discharged_VBN ``_`` cured_VBN ._. ''_''
(_( g._NN )_) Of_IN the_DT 18_CD discharged_VBD ``_`` cured_VBN ,_, ''_'' 11_CD were_VBD below_IN one_CD year_NN ,_, 6_CD below_IN two_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC 1_CD below_IN three_CD years_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT alleged_VBN cause_NN of_IN insanity_NN was_VBD not_RB known_VBN in_IN any_DT one_CD of_IN the_DT cases_NNS ._.
(_( h._NN )_) One_CD remaining_VBG ``_`` cured_VBN ._.
``_`` ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.
29_CD endeavours_NNS to_TO feed_VB him_PRP were_VBD utterly_RB useless_JJ ._.

The_DT figures_NNS relating_VBG to_TO the_DT age_NN of_IN the_DT patients_NNS admitted_VBD show_NN ,_, as_IN usual_JJ ,_, over_IN 70_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN the_DT cases_NNS to_TO be_VB those_DT of_IN persons_NNS in_IN the_DT prime_NN of_IN life_NN between_IN 20_CD and_CC 40_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN ,_, when_WRB ,_, as_IN remarked_VBN by_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_NNP ,_, the_DT strain_NN on_IN the_DT mental_JJ organization_NN is_VBZ heaviest_JJS ._.

The_DT percentage_NN of_IN recoveries_NNS to_TO admission_NN contrasts_NNS very_RB favorably_RB with_IN the_DT results_NNS in_IN previous_JJ years_NNS ,_, viz._NN ,_, 73.29_CD against_IN 32.40_CD in_IN the_DT previous_JJ nine_CD months_NNS ,_, and_CC 42.52_CD and_CC 44.95_CD in_IN 1884-85_JJ and_CC 1883-84_JJ ,_, respectively_RB ._.

6_CD ._.

The_DT percentage_NN of_IN deaths_NNS to_TO the_DT daily_JJ average_JJ strength_NN was_VBD 5.60_CD against_IN 4.64_CD ,_, and_CC to_TO total_JJ admissions_NNS 20.49_CD against_IN 15.08_CD ._.
These_DT rates_NNS are_VBP very_RB high_JJ ,_, and_CC the_DT Government_NNP further_RB observe_VBP that_IN ,_, taking_VBG the_DT Madras_NNP Asylum_NNP alone_RB ,_, the_DT mortality_NN was_VBD much_RB higher_JJR still_RB ,_, being_VBG over_IN 69_CD per_IN mille_NN of_IN the_DT average_JJ strength_NN ._.

From_IN G._NNP BIDIE_NNP ,_, ESQ._NNP ,_, M.B._NNP ,_, C.I.E._NNP ,_, Surgeon-General_JJ with_IN the_DT Government_NNP of_IN Madras_NNP ,_, Ootacamund_NNP ,_, To_TO THE_VB CHIEF_NNP SECRETARY_NNP TO_NNP GOVERNMENT_NNP ,_, Judicial_NNP Department_NNP ,_, Ootacamund_NNP ._.

2_CD ._.
GENERAL_NNP RESULTS.4_NNP ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.
The_DT daily_JJ average_JJ strength_NN of_IN insanes_NNS shows_VBZ a_DT notable_JJ increase_NN over_IN that_DT of_IN 1886_CD in_IN all_DT three_CD institutions_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT daily_JJ average_JJ number_NN of_IN sick_NN was_VBD also_RB larger_JJR ,_, except_IN at_IN Calicut_NNP ._.
The_DT deaths_NNS in_IN 1887_CD were_VBD in_IN Madras_NNP and_CC Calicut_NNP more_RBR numerous_JJ than_IN in_IN 1886_CD ,_, but_CC fewer_JJR in_IN the_DT Vizagapatam_NNP Asylum_NNP ._.
The_DT chief_JJ cases_NNS of_IN inter-_JJ current_JJ ailments_NNS and_CC the_DT causes_NNS of_IN mortality_NN amongst_VBP the_DT insanes_NNS will_MD be_VB noticed_VBN further_RB on_IN ._.
The_DT rates_NNS per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN recoveries_NNS and_CC deaths_NNS to_TO average_VB strength_NN and_CC admissions_NNS were_VBD more_RBR favorable_JJ than_IN in_IN 1886_CD in_IN the_DT Vizagapatam_NNP Asylum_NNP ,_, but_CC less_RBR so_RB in_IN the_DT two_CD others_NNS ._.
Calicut_NNP ,_, however_RB ,_, shows_VBZ the_DT lowest_JJS death-rate_NN ,_, viz._NN ,_, 3.39_CD per_IN cent_NN ._.
of_IN daily_JJ average_JJ strength_NN ._.
4_CD ._.
The_DT subjoined_JJ statement_NN contrasts_VBZ the_DT general_JJ results_NNS in_IN the_DT three_CD insti-_JJ tutions_NNS for_IN the_DT entire_JJ asylum_NN population_NN in_IN 1887_CD ,_, with_IN the_DT averages_NNS of_IN the_DT ten_JJ preceding_JJ years_NNS :_: ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.
5_CD several_JJ ascertained_VBN causes_NNS which_WDT were_VBD believed_VBN to_TO have_VB produced_VBN mental_JJ aber-_JJ ration:6_NN ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.
absent_NN even_RB in_IN the_DT most_RBS serious_JJ cases_NNS ._.
Amongst_IN the_DT causes_NNS leading_VBG to_TO its_PRP$ pre-_JJ valence_NN and_CC great_JJ fatality_NN in_IN Madras_NNP may_MD be_VB included_VBN the_DT privations_NNS to_TO which_WDT most_JJS of_IN the_DT patients_NNS are_VBP subjected_VBN prior_RB to_TO admission_NN ._.
Thirteen_JJ deaths_NNS resulted_VBD from_IN diseases_NNS of_IN the_DT nervous_JJ system_NN ,_, the_DT most_RBS prominent_JJ amongst_NN these_DT being_VBG apoplexy_NN (_( 4_CD )_) ,_, general_JJ paralysis_NN of_IN insane_NN (_( 2_CD )_) and_CC meningitis_NN (_( 3_CD )_) ._.
Seven_RB deaths_NNS were_VBD due_JJ to_TO bowel-complaints_NNS ,_, viz._NN ,_, 5_CD to_TO dysentery_VB and_CC 2_CD to_TO diarrhANNUAL_VB REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.
7_CD substitution_NN of_IN a_DT First-class_NNP Hospital_NNP Assistant_NNP for_IN a_DT Warrant_JJ Officer_NNP at_IN Vizaga-_NNP patam_NN ._.

15_CD ._.
The_DT Madras_NNP Asylum_NNP was_VBD carefully_RB inspected_VBN by_IN me_PRP ,_, and_CC so_RB was_VBD that_IN of_IN Calicut_NNP ._.

16_CD ._.

The_DT question_NN of_IN the_DT best_JJS manner_NN of_IN providing_VBG increased_JJ accommodation_NN in_IN all_DT three_CD asylums_NNS is_VBZ now_RB under_IN the_DT consideration_NN of_IN Government_NNP ,_, and_CC the_DT Surgeon-_NNP General_NNP should_MD expedite_VB the_DT submission_NN of_IN his_PRP$ reply_NN to_TO G.O._NNP ,_, 16th_CD July_NNP 1889_CD ,_, No_DT ._.
1215_CD ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ observed_VBN that_IN the_DT figures_NNS of_IN capacity_NN of_IN each_DT asylum_NN appended_VBD to_TO Statement_NNP I_PRP in_IN the_DT report_NN differ_NN from_IN those_DT supplied_VBN in_IN the_DT monthly_JJ accommodation_NN returns_NNS ,_, and_CC the_DT Government_NNP desires_NNS to_TO be_VB informed_VBN of_IN the_DT reason_NN for_IN this_DT difference_NN ._.

1883-84_JJ .._NNP .._NNP .._NNP .._VBD 652_CD 475_CD 1884-85_JJ .._NNP .._NNP .._NNP .._VBD 707_CD 521_CD 1885_CD (_( 9_CD months_NNS )_) 727_CD 581_CD 1886_CD .._NN .._NNP .._NNP .._VBD 768_CD 588_CD 1887_CD .._NN .._NNP .._NNP .._VBD 797_CD 621_CD Compare_NNP 1888_CD .._NNP 795_CD 645_CD 2_CD ._.
Owing_VBG to_TO the_DT smaller_JJR admissions_NNS ,_, the_DT aggregate_NN of_IN patients_NNS dealt_JJ with_IN during_IN the_DT year_NN slightly_RB diminished_VBD ,_, but_CC the_DT daily_JJ average_JJ population_NN was_VBD considerably_RB higher_JJR than_IN in_IN 1887_CD or_CC preceding_VBG years_NNS ._.
The_DT figures_NNS are_VBP shown_VBN in_IN the_DT margin_NN ._.
This_DT rise_NN in_IN average_JJ number_NN of_IN inmates_NNS seems_VBZ to_TO have_VB been_VBN partly_RB caused_VBN by_IN the_DT smaller_JJR number_NN cured_VBN and_CC otherwise_RB dis-_JJ charged_VBN during_IN 1888_CD ._.
Sixty-one_JJ patients_NNS were_VBD cured_VBN ,_, as_IN compared_VBN with_IN 73_CD in_IN 1887_CD and_CC 118_CD in_IN 1886_CD ,_, the_DT decrease_NN occurring_VBG in_IN the_DT Madras_NNP asylum_NN ,_, where_WRB the_DT number_NN of_IN cures_NNS in_IN the_DT year_NN under_IN report_NN amounted_VBD only_RB to_TO 38_CD ,_, against_IN a_DT five-years_JJ '_POS average_NN of_IN 60_CD ._.
As_IN observed_VBN by_IN the_DT Surgeon-General_JJ with_IN the_DT Government_NNP ,_, the_DT decrease_NN is_VBZ not_RB satisfactory_JJ ,_, but_CC the_DT proportion_NN of_IN cures_NNS varies_NNS so_RB considerably_RB from_IN year_NN to_TO year_NN ,_, and_CC must_MD depend_VB so_RB largely_RB on_IN the_DT character_NN of_IN disease_NN met_VBN with_IN ,_, that_IN no_DT certain_JJ conclusion_NN can_MD be_VB drawn_VBN from_IN the_DT decrease_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ probable_JJ ,_, moreover_RB ,_, that_IN the_DT smaller_JJR number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS tended_VBD to_TO reduce_VB the_DT proportion_NN of_IN cures_NNS ,_, long-standing_JJ cases_NNS being_VBG less_RBR hopeful_JJ than_IN recent_JJ ones_NNS ._.

GENERAL_NNP RESULTS.4_NNP ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.
The_DT daily_JJ average_JJ sick_NN in_IN the_DT three_CD asylums_NNS was_VBD as_IN follows_VBZ :_: ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.
5_CD strength_NN is_VBZ strained_VBN to_TO the_DT utmost_NN in_IN the_DT battle_NN of_IN life_NN ,_, and_CC to_TO the_DT fact_NN that_IN both_DT the_DT physical_JJ and_CC moral_JJ causes_NNS that_WDT tend_VBP to_TO produce_VB insanity_NN are_VBP most_RBS frequently_RB met_VBN with_IN at_IN this_DT age_NN ._.
It_PRP is_VBZ also_RB very_RB probable_JJ that_IN insanes_NNS under_IN 20_CD years_NNS of_IN age_NN are_VBP ,_, in_IN a_DT considerable_JJ number_NN of_IN cases_NNS ,_, taken_VBN care_NN of_IN by_IN their_PRP$ relatives_NNS ._.
The_DT comparatively_RB small_JJ number_NN of_IN admissions_NNS over_IN and_CC above_IN 40_CD is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO the_DT decrement_NN of_IN the_DT general_JJ population_NN at_IN this_DT age_NN and_CC which_WDT is_VBZ more_JJR marked_JJ among_IN insanes_NNS ,_, their_PRP$ mean_JJ age_NN being_VBG less_JJR than_IN among_IN the_DT rest_NN of_IN the_DT population_NN ._.

TYPES_NNP OF_NNP INSANITY.6_NNP ANNUAL_NNP REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.
lunacy_NN were_VBD ascertained_VBN only_RB in_IN 390_CD cases_NNS ,_, while_IN in_IN the_DT remaining_VBG 402_CD cases_NNS the_DT causes_NNS were_VBD unknown_JJ ,_, because_IN of_IN the_DT special_JJ difficulties_NNS existing_VBG in_IN India_NNP in_IN tracing_VBG out_RP the_DT previous_JJ history_NN of_IN insane_NN persons_NNS ,_, not_RB the_DT least_JJS of_IN which_WDT is_VBZ that_IN a_DT large_JJ number_NN of_IN them_PRP are_VBP wanderers_NNS from_IN their_PRP$ homes_NNS uncared_VBN for_IN by_IN their_PRP$ relatives_NNS and_CC are_VBP picked_VBN up_RP by_IN the_DT police_NN and_CC sent_VBD to_TO asylumsANNUAL_VB REPORT_NNP ON_NNP LUNATIC_NNP ASYLUMS_NNP ._.
7_CD The_DT only_JJ asylum_NN that_WDT shows_VBZ any_DT increase_NN in_IN the_DT monthly_JJ average_NN cost_NN is_VBZ Waltair_NNP ;_: but_CC this_DT increase_NN is_VBZ more_JJR than_IN counterbalanced_VBN by_IN the_DT decrease_NN in_IN the_DT Madras_NNP and_CC Calicut_NNP asylums_NNS ._.

I_PRP have_VBP drawn_VBN the_DT attention_NN of_IN Medical_JJ officers_NNS up-_JJ country_NN to_TO this_DT subject_NN ,_, and_CC directed_VBD them_PRP to_TO take_VB care_NN to_TO find_VB out_RP as_RB much_RB as_IN they_PRP possibly_VBP can_MD of_IN the_DT previous_JJ family_NN history_NN and_CC antecedents_NNS of_IN the_DT lunatics_NNS they_PRP may_MD be_VB called_VBN upon_IN to_TO examine_VB ._.
The_DT Medical_NNP officers_NNS in_IN charge_NN of_IN the_DT asylums_NNS have_VBP ,_, in_IN the_DT majority_NN of_IN cases_NNS ,_, nothing_NN to_TO guide_VB them_PRP in_IN forming_VBG an_DT opinion_NN ,_, except_IN the_DT written_VBN documents_NNS which_WDT accompany_VBP the_DT insanes_NNS ,_, and_CC ,_, if_IN these_DT are_VBP carelessly_RB filled_VBN up_RP ,_, the_DT difficulties_NNS in_IN forming_VBG an_DT opinion_NN as_IN to_TO the_DT causes_NNS of_IN insanity_NN are_VBP greatly_RB increased_VBN ._.
10_CD ._.
In_IN reviewing_VBG the_DT annual_JJ report_NN for_IN 1889_CD ,_, exception_NN was_VBD taken_VBN to_TO certain_JJ sub-divisions_NNS adopted_VBN in_IN statement_NN VII_NNP under_IN the_DT two_CD main_JJ heads_NNS ``_`` Physical_JJ causes_VBZ ``_`` and_CC ``_`` Moral_JJ causes_VBZ ``_`` ;_: this_DT year_NN ``_`` Foreign_NNP service_NN ``_`` has_VBZ been_VBN omitted_VBN as_IN a_DT cause_NN of_IN insanity_NN ,_, and_CC ``_`` dissipation_NN ``_`` has_VBZ been_VBN classified_VBN as_IN a_DT physical_JJ cause_NN ._.
As_IN regards_NNS the_DT terms_NNS ``_`` congenital_JJ ''_'' and_CC ``_`` hereditary_JJ ''_'' I_PRP desire_VBP to_TO point_VB out_RP that_IN ,_, though_IN the_DT former_JJ undoubtedly_JJ affords_NNS information_NN in_IN respect_NN to_TO the_DT type_NN of_IN insanity_NN ,_, it_PRP can_MD not_RB be_VB excluded_VBN from_IN the_DT causes_NNS which_WDT tend_VBP to_TO produce_VB insanity_NN ;_: as_IN ,_, for_IN instance_NN ,_, in_IN those_DT cases_NNS where_WRB mental_JJ incapacity_NN is_VBZ due_JJ to_TO congenital_JJ abnormal_JJ conditions_NNS of_IN the_DT bones_NNS of_IN the_DT skull_NN :_: in_IN such_JJ cases_NNS the_DT brain_NN ,_, though_IN it_PRP may_MD have_VB attained_VBN the_DT size_NN natural_JJ at_IN birth_NN ,_, is_VBZ prevented_VBN from_IN further_JJ development_NN by_IN the_DT too_RB early_JJ ossification_NN of_IN the_DT bones_NNS of_IN the_DT skull_NN ,_, and_CC closing_NN of_IN the_DT sutures_NNS ._.

of_IN the_DT cases_NNS treated_VBN in_IN Waltair_NNP and_CC Calicut_NNP ,_, respectively_RB ,_, suggests_VBZ a_DT want_NN of_IN attention_NN to_TO the_DT subject_NN on_IN the_DT part_NN of_IN the_DT Superinten-_JJ dents_NNS concerned_VBN ._.
